data.title: NetView Basics.
data.text:
IBM's NetView is a powerful network management tool designed specifically for IBM's z/OS operating system. It offers a wide range of features to help administrators manage and monitor network resources in mainframe environments efficiently. With NetView, administrators can perform real-time network monitoring, topology discovery, event management, performance analysis, configuration management, automation and scripting, and integration with other tools.

NetView's network monitoring capabilities allow administrators to identify and troubleshoot issues quickly by collecting and displaying performance metrics, status information, and alerts from network devices. Its topology discovery feature builds and maintains a network map, which helps administrators visualize the network layout and understand how devices are interconnected.

NetView's event management feature monitors network events and generates alerts for conditions such as device failures, performance degradation, or configuration changes. Administrators can define event thresholds, notifications, and automated responses to handle events effectively and minimize downtime.

NetView's performance analysis tools allow administrators to identify bottlenecks, analyze traffic trends, and optimize network resource utilization. Its configuration management feature helps ensure consistency and compliance with configuration standards by retrieving device configurations, comparing configurations against predefined templates or baselines, and tracking configuration changes over time.

NetView also includes automation capabilities for automating routine network management tasks and workflows. Administrators can create scripts or automation rules to perform tasks such as device provisioning, configuration backups, or troubleshooting procedures. NetView integrates with other IBM and third-party management tools, allowing administrators to extend its capabilities and integrate with existing network management solutions.

Overall, NetView is a comprehensive network management tool that provides administrators with the tools they need to manage and monitor network resources in mainframe environments effectively.
